name: Battle 100
description:
VR Battle Royal Game ' Battle 100 ' !!!

Be the ultimate winner by fighting against your enemies alone or working with your friends! You can use a variety of weapons to defeat your enemies and build the best

strategy with your colleagues !!

Our Battle 100 can play with up to 100 players. Also, if 100 players are not occupied, additional AI will be created and will be matched.

Also, when you shoot a real gun, the controller will experience vibration and experience being in the field!

Are you ready to be the last one?

Then start Battle 100 right away!
